hero.name: Saurabh Mankar
hero.title: Strategic Technology Leader & Software Engineering Manager
hero.subtitle: Global experience spanning software engineering, cloud architecture, and agile delivery

about.title: About Me
about.summary: Strategic technology leader with global experience spanning software engineering, cloud architecture, and agile delivery. Proven ability to navigate complexity, influence stakeholders, and drive strategic transformation through AI innovation, cloud modernization, and process optimization. Passionate about building empowered teams, mentoring future leaders, and fostering a culture of curiosity and continuous improvement.
highlights: 15+ years of experience across banking, consulting, energy, and insurance sectors
Led solution delivery contributing to $1.3M+ in revenue through strategic consulting
Managed high-performing remote teams with 3 promotions achieved under my leadership
2024 Innovation Award recipient for process optimization initiatives

leadership.title: Leadership Philosophy
leadership.description: I believe in leading by example with a management style focused on clarity, support, and empowerment. My approach combines strategic thinking with hands-on mentorship, fostering an environment where teams thrive and individuals grow into future leaders.

roles.title: Manager II of Software Engineering
achievements: Lead solution delivery for 3,500+ employee utility firm and SaaS crisis management provider serving 500+ organizations, contributing to $1.3M+ in revenue
Managed high-performing remote team of 6 Engineers with effective bi-weekly meetings, resulting in 3 promotions for strong performance
Architected Automated End-to-End and API testing framework using Serenity JS, securing $1.2M contract extension
Designed and deployed AI-powered, AWS-hosted API search service for crisis management with comprehensive CI/CD pipelines
Led 6-month strategic process optimization initiative, delivering data-backed proposal that secured $200K additional revenue
Championed Jira Service Desk transition, cutting resolution time by 60% and earning 2024 Innovation Award
Mentored new hires through biannual career development planning and performance reviews

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Headed design and development of 'Champaigner' mobile mass messaging app for 1200+ financial advising users, generating $50K+ revenue in 4 months
Boosted cloud efficiency through Google Cloud Functions, cutting new customer setup time by 50%
Developed Google Cloud Authentication tool to migrate user credentials, reducing manual migration time by 10-15 days
Built multiple Cloud Functions and custom APIs with Cloud Firestore for scalable NoSQL data storage
Drove agile best practices as Scrum Master, increasing sprint output with elimination of 30% redundant features

roles.title: QA & Software Engineer
achievements: Spearheaded SQL-driven troubleshooting initiatives, cutting production issue resolution time by 50%
Executed comprehensive QA and test automation using Gherkin-based test cases
Developed C# proof-of-concept tool to streamline client data setup, reducing manual effort from 2-3 hours to 30 minutes

roles.title: Systems Engineer
achievements: Contributed to early development of flagship banking product, writing core code
Collaborated with offshore teams in Singapore for comprehensive testing and issue resolution via Jira

items.title: AI-Powered Crisis Management API
items.description: Designed and deployed an intelligent AWS-hosted API search service that transforms static handbook content into a dynamic digital assistant. Enabled 24/7 stakeholder access to critical incident information with comprehensive CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code.
items.impact: Rapid access to crisis management content, seamless data updates, client self-sufficiency through comprehensive documentation

items.title: Automated Testing Framework Architecture
items.description: Led architecture for comprehensive End-to-End and API testing framework using Serenity JS screenplay pattern, integrated with Jenkins for daily execution, error alerts, and stakeholder-friendly dashboards. Successfully replaced ineffective QA processes.
items.impact: Delivered testing POC within 4 months, secured $1.2M contract extension, eliminated ineffective QA processes

items.title: Strategic Process Optimization Initiative
items.description: Led comprehensive 6-month analysis of SQL Server report development inefficiencies through interviews and workflow analysis. Delivered data-backed proposal that transformed team performance and revenue generation.
items.impact: Secured $200K additional revenue, achieved 75% reduction in report backlog, enabled sustainable team performance

items.title: Champaigner Mobile Messaging Platform
items.description: Headed design and development of business-critical custom mobile mass messaging application serving 1200+ financial advising users across global markets. Managed roadmap discussions and mentored international teammates.
items.impact: Generated $50K+ revenue in 4 months, cut customer setup time by 50%, enabled multi-tenant architecture transition

items.title: Enterprise Service Desk Transformation
items.description: Championed transition from inefficient shared mailbox system to comprehensive Jira Service Desk solution. Built and trained 200 users on six management dashboards for tracking and optimization.
items.impact: Cut resolution time by 60%, earned 2024 Innovation Award, increased technology funding for future initiatives

items.title: Cloud Migration & Authentication System
items.description: Developed sophisticated tool using Google Cloud Authentication to migrate user credentials across multiple GCP environments into unified architecture, enabling seamless transition to multi-tenant web application.
items.impact: Reduced manual migration time by 10-15 days, enabled modern architecture transition, resolved legacy-to-modern app challenges
